STORY & INTRO:
---------------------------------
Once upon a sunny day, Suzie is walking down the street and stumbles upon a sushi house. From that day on, Suzie's biggest dream is to own a successful sushi house. 10 years later she starts her first small sushi house, but how far can her dream take her? That's something only you can determine...

LITE VERSION:
---------------------------------
- Try the first 10 levels of Suzie's Sushi House!

FULL GAME FEATURES:
---------------------------------
- 19 amazing real-life sushi recipes
- 31 levels of fun
- 12 ingredients to make your sushi
- 9 challenging achievements
- 9 high quality sound tracks
- Star reputation system to boost your score
- Leaderboard to compare your score with your friends
- Easy and Hard modes
- Intuitive controls and an interactive tutorial

oh and...
- hidden recipe *Hot Lover's Roll*
